amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike sections 1032 and 1033 from the bill which prohibit the use of funds to transfer detainees from Guantanamo Bay, Cuba, to the United States or to construct or expand any facility in the U.S. to house any individual detained at Guantanamo.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 12 printed in Part B of House Report 114-569 to remove funding prohibitions on the closure of the prison at Guantanamo Bay, Cuba.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Nadler amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 163 - 259 (Roll no. 204).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Nadler amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 163 - 259 (Roll no. 204).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A007) offered by Mr. Nadler.
